## Discussion

If you set a language ID, the search returns addresses in the selected language, if available, such as, `fr-CA` or `en-GB`. If you don’t provide a language ID, the search object uses the language ID the system provides to the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/mapkit/init] call.

# language

**Interface Property**

A language ID that determines the language for the search results text.

## Declaration

```swift
language?: string;
```

## Discussion

If you set a language ID, the search returns addresses in the selected language, if available, such as, `fr-CA` or `en-GB`. If you don’t provide a language ID, the search object uses the language ID the system provides to the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/mapkit/init] call.
title: language
